author: nitinbps
body:
Start-PSBuild -runtime win7-x86 -Configuration Release 
Powershell is failing to build the above configuration on appveyor machine due to not able to find onecore.lib for src\powershell-native\nativemsh\pwrshexe. This directory shouldn't have build in the first place as it is not used. It is getting build @
src\powershell-native\CMakeLists.txt ( at the very bottom of the file)
title: Powershell is building nativemsh/pwrshexe causing the x86 build to fail on appveyor
